info.description: This is the generated swagger.json for all investor endpoints. Download a swagger.json here - https://github.tlcinternal.com/pages/LendingClub/investor-api/docs/api/swagger.json
info.title: Investor REST API Swagger JSON

get.summary: Returns the Investor Profile for specified actor
Return list of activities. Input date is in pacific timezone with date format YYYY-MM-DD. Max date range 30 days will be enforced.
Return Activity Detail based on activity id
Returns a list of agreements for an investor
Streams agreement based on investor, agreement type and version.
Returns Automated Investment strategy for an investor. It reflects target allocation percentages for each grade
get autosave account eligibility and details
Gets the available cash for an investor account
Returns bank account for an investor

parameters.name: primary-only
parameters.description: If this value is set to true, API returns only investor's primary accounts

parameters.name: deposit-only
parameters.description: If this value is set to true, API will only return the HYS Deposit Account(s)

get.summary: Returns the current allocation percentages for each grade
Returns financial summary
Returns Automated Investment strategy for an investor
Returns the Investor Net Annualized Returns summary
Returns matching Investor Profiles based on ssn for specified actor

post.summary: Link matching Investor Profiles based on ssn for specified actor

get.summary: Returns a detailed view of notes for an actor
Returns a detailed view of note for an actor given a note id
Return list of orders. Input date is in pacific timezone with date format YYYY-MM-DD. Max date range 120 days will be enforced.
Return order details
Returns a list of months with statements
Returns the statement for given month of the year
Returns a list of years with tax statements
Returns the tax statement for a given year in excel or pdf format
Returns a list of years with statements
Returns the statement for a given year
Returns transfers for an actor
Returns transfer schedules for an actor
Returns a list of portfolios by actor Id.

post.summary: Returns 'Success', if the portfolio was created, portfolio details will return.

get.summary: Returns a portfolio details by actor Id and portfolio Id.

delete.summary: Delete a Portfolio and disassociate existing notes.

patch.summary: Update Portfolio, Name, Description or Notes

get.summary: Returns a list of note details by portfolio Id.

patch.summary: Add/Remove list of notes to/from a portfolio.
Merge one or more portfolios into another.

post.summary: Creates bank account with legal agreements and transfers fund
Creates bank account and transfers fund

get.summary: Return investor application info
Checks if the given list of investors are valid LC 1.0 investors or not

patch.summary: Update the phone number and address for the specified actor

get.summary: Returns Automated Investment strategy for an investor. It reflects target allocation percentages for each grade, Internal Use
Returns autosave config for an investor

post.summary: Add or update investor autosave config

get.summary: Returns financial summary
Returns an aggregate summary of notes for an actor, when showAllOrders is set to True, the API is only intended to be used by scale program, then principalPending will not be populated.
Return list of orders.

post.summary: Verify ID check, Credit check, calculate SF leadscore and publish KYC event

get.summary: Returns an aggregate summary of loans for an actor based on criteria.
Retrieves all ActorPartnerAccounts associated with the given actorId

401.description: User not permitted to access resource

post.summary: Create a actor partner account number for the specified actor

401.description: User not permitted to access resource

patch.summary: Updates ActorPartnerAccount for a given actorId

get.summary: Returns configuration of current AI split

post.summary: Creates the new configuration of AI split

get.summary: Returns latest AI templates
Gets Bank Account Summary for an institutional investor

401.description: User not permitted to access resource

get.summary: Returns investor fee cfgs for an investor
Returns all the fees configs
Returns the fractional demand for a specific period

post.summary: Calculates investor demand based on existing data in TLC

get.summary: Returns the current multiplier for a specific grade and term

post.summary: persists the fractional demand multiplier for a specific grade and term

get.summary: Gets the profile for an institutional investor

401.description: User not permitted to access resource

post.summary: Sets the profile for an institutional investor

401.description: User not permitted to access resource

post.summary: Create ISTC Deposit and Investment Purchase

get.summary: Get Contribution details
Get Custodian list
Get docu-sign url
Get ISTC account details
Get PDF file
Returns a list of lcx listing configurations
Returns a list of lcx primary market listing configurations

put.summary: Disables an existing config by setting end date

get.summary: Returns a base summary of loans
Returns a list of lcx primary market price configurations

post.summary: Creates an lcx primary market price configuration

get.summary: Returns a list of lcx primary market price configurations

put.summary: Updates an lcx primary market price configuration with new one
Disables an existing config by setting end date

get.summary: Get details of loans by loan IDss
Returns details of loans eligible for funding using generic allocation
Returns details of loans with matching statuses, given a CSV string of statuses (LcLoanEnums.Status ordinals).Example: 27,28 (LcLoanEnums.Status.READY_FOR_LCX,LcLoanEnums.Status.IN_FUNDING_LCX)
Returns details of loans with matching ids, given a CSV string of loan ids
Returns details of loans currently listed on the passive platform

post.summary: Updates the status of passive loans from INFUNDING to NEW
Updates the status of passive loans to INFUNDING
Updates the status of prime loans from given existing status to NEW

get.summary: Returns a list of loan tape details
Returns a list of note details
Returns a list of extended note details

put.summary: Allows updates to investor accounts. Supported operations - account open/close, Grant/revoke folio access and Update KYC status

get.summary: Gets the list of Actor Ids for a given user id

401.description: User not permitted to access resource

get.summary: Returns the Slice and Dice values for Investor Statistics. Input dates in date format YYYY-MM.

allocations.description: Map of allocations based on the term, grade and the percentage
Map of allocations based on the term, grade and the percentage

publicId.description: the unique id which represnts the resource

operation.description: Operation to be performed on account

userStatus.description: userStatus to be set for the account

date.description: Activity Date. ISO DateTime format in UTC, e.g. 2017-09-23T07:00:00.000Z

amount.description: Amount corresponding to the activity type

startDate.description: Start Date for activities in this response. ISO DateTime format in UTC, e.g. 2017-09-23T07:00:00.000Z

endDate.description: End Date for the activities in this response. Maybe different than requests input if it is over 30 days. ISO DateTime format in UTC, e.g. 2017-09-23T07:00:00.000Z

loanIds.description: The ids of loans that should be updated

newStatus.description: Optional desired new status. Some endpoints may limit to a hardcoded new status so won't use this parameter

investableAmount.description: Investable Amount which includes locked amount

availableBalance.description: Available balance which includes locked amount

committedCash.description: Committed Cash for loans not yet issued

operation.description: Operation to be performed on folio account

traderStatus.description: traderStatus to be set for the folio account

traderAppStatus.description: traderAppStatus to be set for the folio account

publicId.description: Public id of the investment filter

createdDate.description: Created date of the investment filter in ISO format

dob.description: Investor Date Of Birth in yyyy-MM-dd format

totalRecordsCreated.description: Number of records created in INVESTOR_DEMAND table

kycStatus.description: kycStatus to be set for the account

agreementType.description: Agreement type signed/agreed by the user for adding bank account

agreementVersion.description: Agreement version signed/agreed by the user for adding bank account

signedTimestamp.description: Agreement signed Timestamp in ISO format

signedMethod.description: Agreement signed method - web is the only supported value yet.

prodId.description: Product Id for which the allocation is applicable

basketLoanCount.description: The unit(number of loans) in each basket

allocationCapAmt.description: The maximum total amount of all buckets can be listed

startDate.description: Start date of the listing config

endDate.description: End date of the listing config

ListingConfigModel.description: Model used to create an LCX Primary market listing config

product.description: The product of the loans that should be updated

loanIds.description: The ids of loans that should be updated

items.description: List of notes/loans to be transferred

tapeId.description: The loan tape ID (the PK in NS_LOAN_TAPE_REVISION table)

asOfDate.description: Effective date of loans service response

expDefaultRate.description: Expected default rate of the loan

serviceFeeRate.description: Service fee rate paid by investor for the loan

loanStatus.description: Payment Status such as New|In Funding|Expired|Removed|Issued|Fully Paid|Partially Funded|Fraudulent|In Review|Current|In Grace Period|Late (16-30 days)|Late (31-120 days)|Default|Charged Off|Settled|Sold|Internal Status|Withdrawn by Applicant|Loan is being issued|Loan submitted to Loan Servicing|Loan not serviced by LC|Loan to be funded passively|Loan to be funded by access program

issuedDate.description: Note Issued Date. ISO DateTime format in UTC, e.g. 2017-09-23T07:00:00.000Z

portfolioId.description: Portfolio ID assigned to the note

portfolioName.description: Portfolio Name assigned to the note

nextPaymentDate.description: Next Payment Date. ISO DateTime format in UTC, e.g. 2017-09-23T07:00:00.000Z

paymentsReceived.description: Payments Received so far on this note

expDefaultRate.description: Expected default rate of the loan

serviceFeeRate.description: Service fee rate paid by investor for the loan

loanStatus.description: Payment Status such as New|In Funding|Expired|Removed|Issued|Fully Paid|Partially Funded|Fraudulent|In Review|Current|In Grace Period|Late (16-30 days)|Late (31-120 days)|Default|Charged Off|Settled|Sold|Internal Status|Withdrawn by Applicant|Loan is being issued|Loan submitted to Loan Servicing|Loan not serviced by LC|Loan to be funded passively|Loan to be funded by access program

issuedDate.description: Note Issued Date. ISO DateTime format in UTC, e.g. 2017-09-23T07:00:00.000Z

portfolioId.description: Portfolio ID assigned to the note

portfolioName.description: Portfolio Name assigned to the note

nextPaymentDate.description: Next Payment Date. ISO DateTime format in UTC, e.g. 2017-09-23T07:00:00.000Z

paymentsReceived.description: Payments Received so far on this note

items.description: List of notes/loans to be transferred

required: Are zero balance loans allowed to be moved

enum: BOOK_MOVE | SALE | DEATH | DIVORCE | FORFEITURE | GIFT | LC_ERROR | ISSUANCE_CANCELLATION | ACCOUNT_TYPE_CHANGE | SECURITIZATION | DEBT_SALE | REPURCHASE

weightedAvgInterestRate.description: weighted average interest rate (int_rate * note_amount) / sum of all note_amounts

weightedAvgPortfolioAge.description: weighted average portfolio age in months((curr_date - issue_date) in months * note_amount) / sum of all note_amounts

principalPending.description: Total principal pending, this value will be empty when the call is made from scale program. i.e. showAllOrders=true

submittedDate.description: Order Submitted Date. ISO DateTime format in UTC, e.g. 2017-09-23T07:00:00.000Z

noteDetails.description: Note details of the order. It is only populated when withOrderDetails request parameter is true.

startDate.description: Start Date for the orders in this response. ISO DateTime format in UTC, e.g. 2017-09-23T07:00:00.000Z

endDate.description: End Date for the orders in this response. Maybe different than requests input if it is over 120 days. ISO DateTime format in UTC, e.g. 2017-09-23T07:00:00.000Z

term.description: The number of payments on the loan. Values are in months and can be either 36 or 60.

loanAmount.description: The listed amount of the loan applied for by the borrower.

approvalDate.description: The date that this loan was approved.

preAssignedInvestorId.description: The Investor AID, to whom this loan is pre assigned

startDate.description: Start date of the price config

endDate.description: End date of the price config

startingAskPricePercent.description: Starting ask price percent of the price config

reservedAskPricePercent.description: Reserved ask price percent of the price config

tickPercent.description: Tick percent of the price config

tickFrequency.description: Tick frequency of the price config

listingCount.description: Listing count of the price config

PriceConfigModel.description: Model used to create an LCX Primary market price config

scheduledDate.description: Date when TransferRequest is scheduled to execute
Date when TransferRequest is scheduled to execute

publicId.description: Public Id for the transfer request

expectedCompletionDate.description: The day that the operation is expected to complete.

completionDate.description: The day that the operation completed.

UpdateAutomatedInvestingTemplateRequestM.description: Request model for the update AI Template
